body_html:
This is what works for me, (Win Insider Preview 15048.rs2_release.170228-1522)

  1. Create an env
  2. conda config --add channels conda-forge
  3. new window ...
  4. Activate (whatever env)
  5. conda install tensorflow.

Woof a few times, and Voilà!

body:
This is what works for me, (Win Insider Preview 15048.rs2_release.170228-1522)
1. Create an env
2. conda config --add channels conda-forge
3. new window ...
4. Activate (whatever env)
5. conda install tensorflow. 

Woof a few times, and Voilà!
